name: PixHELLanD
description:
Welcome in PixHELLanD!

2D platformer for one player .
 
The story : a Princess / a Badguy / a kidnapping / a Hero / a track.
90 levels, plus 8 secret level, 6 worlds along which you'll have to avoid obstacles, creatures as 6 Bosses, 1000+ ways to die.
Are you ready for this ?

The game is a mix of platform, shooter, puzzle and address game using the gyroscope.
A scoring system will push the player to replay to improve.

Moving is classical and simple:
 Two arrows for left and right as a button for jumping and double-jumping.

PUSH START NOW!!!!
